title: FS-Reduced: T206 Cycles, Polar Bears, SC, Piedmonts
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: FS-Reduced: T206 Cycles, Polar Bears, SC, Piedmonts
posts.post_content:
These cards were soaked to remove them from being glued to a mounting board using distilled water and dried using unbleached paper towels. I submitted 9 cards to PSA for grading and all 9 received numerical grades.  All cards below, except for Merritt, are guaranteed to get a number grade as well, should you choose to submit them.

All prices are net to me, with PayPal preferred. Free shipping for orders over $100, $5 for under $100.

Please PM or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to purchase or with any questions. Thanks!
Significant price reductions on the remaining cards!
Last card: Phelan with Cycle 350 back is now $500
